entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
